entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 12:00 AM EST Friday 30 December 2022

Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 4.3°C
Wind: SSW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle or rain. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle. Periods of rain beginning before morning. Fog patches. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to 7 by morning. Forecast issued 10:26 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle late in the morning and early afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. Forecast issued 10:26 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 10:26 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
